txt.en: The safety of Talath Úrui is hampered by the many worms and salamanders encroaching the land thanks to Ghâshghurm. You should lower their numbers and thus their hold upon the realm.
Talath Úrui is safer to cross now that you have defeated a great number of worms and salamanders.
Worms and salamanders can be found in Talath Úrui, mainly near the Ghâshghurm.\n\nYou should defeat any worms and salamanders that you encounter.
Defeated many worms and salamanders in Talath Úrui.
Worms and salamanders thrive in the embrace of the Ghâshghurm.
